Here's my projects.

Closed and open-source websites, apps, and packages I've built.

Use The Keyboard is a simplistic and open-sourced repository of keyboard shortcuts for a variety of websites and apps.

— https://usethekeyboard.com

Larametrics is a self-hosted metrics and notifications platform for Laravel apps, built with production environments in mind.

— https://larametrics.com

PDFBlade is a developer-friendly HTML to PDF API with robust documentation and a wide variety of formatting options.

— https://pdfblade.com

Cleaver is what this site was built with. It's a blazing-fast static site generator that uses Laravel's Blade templating engine.

— https://usecleaver.com

Budget.cool is a simplistic and free budgeting app with a manual-only entry mode. Built as a Vue SPA with a Laravel backend.

— https://budget.cool

Larahawk is an easy-to-setup, super simple error reporting and notifications platform for Laravel applications.

— https://larahawk.com

Passhints is a simplistic and open-sourced repository of password requirements for a variety of websites and apps.

— https://passhints.co

Watch The Credits is an online library of movies, detailing whether or not they contain mid or after-credit scenes and spoilers.

— https://watchthecredits.com

docker-compose-laravel is a very basic Docker workflow for local Laravel app development, originally built for a video series on the same subject.

— https://github.com/aschmelyun

©2020 Andrew Schmelyun

This website was built with Cleaver, and the entire source is on GitHub.
